Key Match Events: Tanner Bibee pitching on short rest
Carlos Rodón pitching on regular rest
Pre-Game Insights: Guardians manager Stephen Vogt said 'Everybody is tired' due to heavy usage of relievers
Yankees manager Aaron Boone emphasized the importance of discipline in bullpen usage
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Boone said Carlos Rodón 'grew' and 'learned from that' experience of pitching in the post-season with the Yankees
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees may be without three of their top relief arms as they attempt to win the pennant
The Guardians have shown game after game that they're more than willing to turn to the bullpen early
Others: The game will determine if the series will go back to New York for a sixth game
A win for the Yankees would secure some much-needed rest for their bullpen while lining up Gerrit Cole to start the first game of the World Series
